name: The Passage of Time
description: Learn how turns work and how to advance through the game phases. Master the rhythm of galactic command.

story.briefing: Commander, time in the galaxy flows in turns. Each turn consists of four phases: Income, Action, Combat, and End. Understanding this cycle is crucial to effective command. Your empire's growth depends on it.
story.objective: Complete two full turns by pressing SPACE to end each Action phase.
story.victory: Outstanding, Commander! You've mastered the turn cycle. Income arrives automatically, you control the Action phase, and Combat resolves on its own. This rhythm will guide your conquest.

tutorialSteps.text: Welcome back, Commander! Notice the Turn HUD in the top-left corner. It shows 'Turn 1 - Action Phase'. This is where you make decisions.
See the 'END TURN [Space]' button? When you're ready to advance, press SPACE or click this button. Try it now!
You're now in the Combat Phase. Since there are no enemies, it passes quickly. Watch as the phases progress automatically.
The End Phase processes AI actions and checks victory conditions. Since AI is disabled, this is brief.
Turn 2 begins with the Income Phase! Watch your resources increase as production is calculated. Income happens automatically every turn.
You're back in the Action Phase. End one more turn to complete this tutorial. Press SPACE now!

steps.instruction: Find the Turn HUD in the top-left corner of the galaxy map
Look for the 'END TURN [Space]' button below the turn counter
steps.expectedResult: The button is visible and clickable during Action phase

steps.instruction: Press SPACE on your keyboard OR click the END TURN button
steps.expectedResult: Phase changes to 'Combat Phase' then auto-advances

steps.instruction: Observe as Combat -> End -> Income phases pass automatically
steps.expectedResult: Notifications appear for each phase transition

steps.instruction: Watch the resource panel during Income phase
steps.expectedResult: Resources increase based on your production

steps.instruction: Press SPACE again to end Turn 2

steps: SPACE - End turn (during Action phase only)
